news.description: Google released the August 2023 core update and initiated its gradual deployment. The company plans to update its ranking release history page in a few weeks once the update's rollout is complete.

news.title: Expand the Power of PPC Advertising for Your Law Firm: Join Our Free Webinar
news.description: Are you a lawyer struggling to navigate the ever-evolving PPC advertising landscape? Or maybe you are interested in optimizing new channels to grow your practice? Look no further - we have the event for you!

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Small Business Center
news.description: Starting a business is exciting but also risky. A business owner must account for many legal and practical concerns en route to realizing their vision. The Small Business Legal Center at Justia points out some issues to keep in mind.
